summary.para: Represents the status of a Content Decryption Module (CDM) session key.

remarks.para: This structure is used as the output parameter for the method.
MFMediaKeyStatus is based on the Encrypted Media Extension specification's MediaKeyStatusMap.

summary.para: A byte array representing the identifier of a session key.
The number of bytes in the pbKeyId parameter.
A value from the enumeration specifying the status of the associated session key.
